thread.title: PNC Earnings Tick Higher, But Some Key Metrics Fall
thread.title_full: PNC Earnings Tick Higher, But Some Key Metrics Fall - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: PNC Earnings Tick Higher, But Some Key Metrics Fall
text:
PNC Financial Services Group Inc. said its profit edged up in the third quarter, despite lower revenue and a decline in a key measure of lending profitability.
Earnings topped Wall Street estimates, aided by a lower share count and a lower tax rate, while revenue fell short.
The bank reported a profit of $1.06 billion, up from $1.04 billion in the prior-year period. On a per-share basis, earnings rose to $1.90 from $1.79 as... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
